DOC.criteria: Subjects must adult male female age 21 80 year ( inclusive ) . Subjects must able willing follow study procedure instruction English . Subjects must read , understood sign informed consent form English . Subjects must least four mandibular implant future treatment need . Subjects must meet one follow category consider enrollment : Group 1 ( control ) : Subjects must nondiabetic , history smoking within last two year metabolic bone disease diagnosis . Group 2 ( diabetic ) : Subjects must Type 2 diabetes mellitus diagnosed physician medication history . The condition must currently diagnose treat medication and/or insulin . An HbA1C test perform either within past 3 month must available one do first visit study personnel . Subjects must history smoking within last two year diagnosis metabolic bone disease . Group 3 ( Osteoporosis osteopenia ) : Subjects must diagnose osteoporosis osteopenia must currently care physician treatment oral bisphosphonates . Subjects must never intravenous ( IV ) bisphosphonates . Subjects group must nondiabetic history smoking within last 2 year . Subjects undergoing test cylinder placement adequate periodontal health prior implant placement . This include probe depth ≤ 4 mm remain teeth quadrant propose cylinder placement . Patients periodontal probe site probe depth 5 mm may also include bleed probe site absent . Each subject consider periodontally stable prior receive test cylinder . Individuals chronic disease oral manifestation . Individuals exhibit gross oral pathology . The use either antibiotic chronic use NSAIDs within 1 month prior screen examination . Individuals require antibiotic prophylaxis prior dental treatment . Chronic treatment ( i.e . two week ) medication know affect periodontal status ( e.g . phenytoin , calcium antagonist , cyclosporine , Coumadin ) within 1 month prior screen examination . Systemic condition , except diabetes , osteoporosis osteopenia know affect periodontal status .
